item.title: Airbnb in Hong Kong - EDA
item.description: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) hk_listings <- vroom("http://data.insideairbnb.com/china/hk/hong-kong/2020-06-15/data/listings.csv.gz") At first glance, there are 11187 observations of 106 variables in the data set.

item.title: Yield Curve inversion
item.description: Introduction Every so often, we hear warnings from commentators on the “inverted yield curve” and its predictive power with respect to recessions.

item.title: Where Do People Drink The Most Beer, Wine And Spirits?
item.description: At first glance: Back in 2014, fivethiryeight.com published an article on alchohol consumption in different countries.

item.title: Life expectancy, population, and GDP per capita
item.description: The gapminder dataset that has data on life expectancy, population, and GDP per capita for 142 countries from 1952 to 2007.
